entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
